title: Mucklet's Terms of Service
body:
These Terms of Service (or just "Terms") let you know the rules that govern our relationship with you as a user of our game and forum, which is collectively referred to as the "Service". These Terms form a contract between you and Mucklet AB ("we", "us", "our"), to let you know what we give you rights to use this Service for, and also what rights you agree to give to us.

We reserves the right to update these Terms for reasons including, but not limited to, complying with changes to the law or reflecting enhancements to the Service. If the changes affect your usage of the Service or your legal rights, we will notify you at least seven days before the changes take effect.

By using our Service, you agree to these Terms. Of course, if you don't agree with them, don't use the Service.

Who can use the Service

No one under 18 is allowed to create an account or use the Service. This is because we cannot guarantee that the content is suitable for minors, since much of the content is produced by other users. We would also not be able to properly safeguard minors against grooming, or other illicit behavior.

Rights we grant you

We own this Service, but we give you the right to use it and enjoy it, in a way that these Terms and the in-game rules allow. We may revoke this right at any time for reasons including, but not limited to, you using the Service in a way not authorized by these Terms (including helping others to do so), or if you do not comply with the in-game rules.

Rights you grant us

Our Service allows you to create, send, receive, upload, and store information; also called "content". When you do that, you retain whatever ownership right in that content you had to begin with. But you grant us the right to use that content for the purpose it was provided, even if you decide to stop using the Service or delete your account.

You also give us the right to access, review, and delete any content that we think violates these Terms or the in-game rules. You alone, though, remain responsible for the content you provide.

Privacy

Our Privacy Policy describes how we store and handle the information you provide to us.

The content of others

Just like you keep whatever ownership you had for the content you provide, others will also do so for their content. Whether that content is made public or sent to you in private, you may only use that content for your own private purpose, unless you get the rights from the owners.

Also, just like you are responsible for the content you provide, others are responsible for the content they provide. Although we reserve the right to review content, we do not necessarily review it all. So we cannot - and do not - guarantee that other users' content will comply with these Terms and the in-game rules.

Prohibited content

You may not upload content that contains:

  • sexually suggestive or explicit photos of real people;
  • photos depicting graphic violence, humiliation, or gore;
  • sexually suggestive or explicit images of characters with childlike appearance;

If an image is not a photo, but may be mistaken for one, it will be regarded as a photo.

Respecting others' rights

You may not provide content that infringes on someone elses intellectual property. If you use an image, or add content based on someone elses work, make sure you have the rights to do so. And give credits where credit is due.

Payments

Our services are free to use, but you may be able to pay for additional features and perks. Our Payment Terms describe the terms and conditions for payments made to us.

Permitted use

You must only use the Service in a way permitted by these Terms. This means, among other things, you may not do, attempt to do, enable, or encourage anyone else to do, any of the following:

  • use the Service in a way not permitted by law;
  • use the Service in a way that could interfere, disrupt, negatively affect, or inhibit other users from fully enjoying the Service;
  • access or use the Service in any manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the function of the Service;
  • attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Service including, but not limited to, other accounts, other users' content, or server infrastructure;
  • create or use bots accessing the Service for any other purpose than improving game play;
  • create a new account if we have disabled your account;

Disclaimers

We provide this service to you "as is" and "as available", without warranty of any kind. We want to keep it a fun and safe place to hang out, but we cannot promise that it will always be available or that it will be fit for any particular purpose.

Limitation of Liability

To the extent permitted by law, we don't take responsibility for any negative consequences, direct or indirect, related to using our Service, or inability to access the Service. Such negative consequences includes, but is not limited to, loss of data, loss of profit, loss of goodwill, or other intangible losses. And you agree to not hold us, or anyone associated with making this Service available, liable for any such negative consequences.

Mucklet AB or its proprietors may not be held accountable for content provided by the users of the Service. We will take reasonable actions to moderate this content in accordance with these Terms.
